description:
Manipulate Document Annotations in Any Platform.
Add interactive and advanced annotation features to documents in any application, using our true REST APIs.
releaseNotes:
GroupDocs.Annotation for Cloud is a REST API for manipulating and exporting annotations of documents with different formats in the cloud. Annotation.Words supported:
        * doc
        * docm 
        * docx 
        * dot
        * dotm
        * dotx 
        * rtf
        * odt 
        * ott 
        * txt
      Annotation.Cells supported:
        * xls
        * xlsx
      Annotation.Slides supported:
        * ppt
        * pptx
        * ppsx
        * odp
        * otp
      Annotation.Pdf supported:
        * pdf
      Annotation.Diagram supported:
        * vssx
        * vss
        * vssm
        * vdx
        * vsd
        * vsdx
        * vsdm
        * vstm
        * vsx
        * vtx
      Annotation.Imaging supported:
        * bmp
        * png
        * jpg
        * jpeg
        * tiff
        * tif
        * gif
      Annotation.Email supported:
        * eml
        * emlx
        * msg
        * mhtml

GroupDocs.Annotation provides features for export/import annotations into/from files, additionally to possibility to save files in supported formats with following types of annotations: 
      * Text annotations:
          * Text annotation – add comments to selected text.
          * Text replacement – highlight which text should be replaced with what.
          * Text redaction – hide confidential text.
          * Strikeout/underline – highlight text with strikethroughs/underlines.
          * Typewriter – add sticky notes with rich text.
      * Figure annotations:                                               
          * Area annotation – add notes to an area highlighted with a rectangle.
          * Point annotation – add notes to any point in the document.
          * Area redaction – hide confidential parts of an image or text.
          * Polyline – draw freehand lines and shapes.
          * Pointer/arrow – drop arrows pointing to an object.
          * Watermark – create text-based watermark overlays.
          * Distance – measure the distance between any objects in a document.
title: GroupDocs.Annotation Cloud SDK for .NET
